amendatorysection.catchline: Double inoculation against cholera; tags; contents.
amendatorysection.para: Any person owning or possessing any hogs and desiring to ship, sell, or otherwise dispose of the same, may attach to any such hog, which has received double inoculation against hog cholera, a metal tag displaying the registered brand of such shipper, owner, or possessor, or such information as to enable any person reading the tag to readily ascertain the name and address of such shipper, owner, or possessor, which tag shall display the lettering CV. The tag shall be attached to the left ear of such hog at a point as close to the head as possible. The tag so affixed shall be the warranty of the shipper, owner, or possessor that the animal has actually received double inoculation against hog cholera.
